screen_desc: It seems like you've uploaded a file, but I currently cannot view the contents. If you'd like, you can describe it, and I'd be happy to help you with any specific questions or details you need!
history_actions: click on the Settings icon located at the upper left.
click on the "System" option located at the middle-lower part of the screen.
click on the "Languages & input" located at the upper left.
click on the "Virtual keyboard" settings located at the left and upper middle part of the screen.
click on the "Gboard Multilingual typing" option located at the upper left side of the screen.
click on the "Theme" located at upper middle and left.
click on the theme option located at right and lower middle.

think_action.Thought: The user has reached the theme settings for the keyboard. The current screen shows the keyboard theme options, including a preview of the keyboard and a toggle for 'Key borders'. The 'Key borders' toggle is enabled, but the user hasn't applied any changes yet. The next logical step is to click the 'APPLY' button to save the changes made to the theme.
Future Action Plan: Enable or disable 'Key borders' if necessary
Click on the 'APPLY' button to save the changes
